creator: alexeys@inventigo.com
text: <csc ... extraOptions="/res:path1 /res:path2"> results in error message saying that "path1 /res:path2" is invalid.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
This is still broken in Ant1.6 beta1, but that beta does have better resource
import, with a <resource> nested element for you to use in this particular case.

thanks for the patch, will target this for beta2

creator: alexeys@inventigo.com
text:
Created attachment 8453
updated patch (now uses CommandLine utility instead of StringTokenizer) for src/main/org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs/optional/dotnet/DotnetCompile.java

I have updated the patch to use CommandLine class - CommandLine provides better argument parsing.

Where can I find <resource> documentation? csc.html just mentions it.
creator: alexeys@inventigo.com

text:
yes, nested elements slipped through the autogeneration stage. I will add some
docs. Assume it is a fileset, unless otherwise stated.
creator: stevel@apache.org
